attributes.action: Continue with Brexit. The people of the UK democratically voted to leave.
attributes.additional_details: The people of the UK have voted to leave the UK. The government and the judges need to follow what has been democratically voted for.
attributes.background: Continue with Brexit. The people of the UK want to leave the EU and have voted to do so. Continue with the will of the people and what they have voted for and leave the EU as soon as possible.
